private void throwServiceException(java.lang.String errorCode,
                                   java.lang.String plainMessage)
                            throws ServiceException
Throws a new ServiceException with the localized message get from error code or the plain message if localization fails.

Parameters:
errorCode - Error code to get localized error message
plainMessage - Error message to be used if localization fails

throwServiceException

private void throwServiceException(java.lang.String errorCode,
                                   java.lang.String plainMessage,
                                   java.lang.Throwable cause)
                            throws ServiceException
Throws a new ServiceException with the localized message get from error code or the plain message if localization fails.

Parameters:
errorCode - Error code to get localized error message
plainMessage - Error message to be used if localization fails
cause - Exception that caused this exception
Throws:
ServiceException
